item.name: 1A_Change_Pool_Member_State
item.description:
Change the specified pool member state.

Input Variables:

 {{bigip_pool_name}} 	Pool Name
 {{bigip_parition}}		Partition Name
 {{bigip_pool_member}}	Pool Member IP/Node Name
 {{bigip_object_state}} Pool Member State
 
The {{bigip_object_state}} variable must be one of the following:

 enabled
 disabled
 force-disabled

item.name: 1B_Add_Pool_Member
item.description:
Add a pool member to a pool.

Input Variables:

 {{bigip_pool_name}} 	Pool Name
 {{bigip_parition}}		Partition Name
 {{bigip_pool_member}}	Pool Member IP/Node Name
 {{bigip_object_state}} Pool Member State
 
The {{bigip_object_state}} variable must be one of the following:

 enabled
 disabled
 force-disabled

item.name: 1C_Delete_Pool_Member
item.description:
Delete the specified pool member.

Input Variables:

 {{bigip_pool_name}} 	Pool Name
 {{bigip_parition}}		Partition Name
 {{bigip_pool_member}}	Pool Member IP/Node Name

item.name: 2A_Change_Node_State
item.description:
Change the specified pool member state.

Input Variables:

 {{bigip_parition}}		Partition Name
 {{bigip_node_name}}	Node Name
 {{bigip_object_state}} Pool Member State
 
The {{bigip_object_state}} variable must be one of the following:

 enabled
 disabled
 force-disabled

item.name: 3A_Change_Virtual_Server_State
item.description:
Change the specified virtual server state.

Input Variables:

 {{bigip_vs_name}} 		Virtual Server Name
 {{bigip_parition}}		Partition Name
 {{bigip_vs_enabled}} 	Virtual Server State
 
The {{bigip_vs_enabled}} variable must be one of the following:

 true
 false
